error.title: Error page!

http.401: Failed to sign in! Please check your credentials and try again.
http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.

report.noJobInQueue: To generate a monthly report, please select last day of the month.

violation.history: You used the password recently. Please choose a different password.

user.unlocked: Your account is unlocked. Please reset your password here.
user.locked: Your account is locked. Please contact administrator to activate your account.
user.suspended: Your account is suspended. Please contact administrator to activate your account.
user.expired: Your account is expired. Please reset your password here.
user.disabled: Your account is not active. Please contact administrator to activate your account.
user.alreadyLogin: You already logged in on another system

error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
